article: Bare foot and dirty, the girl just sat and watched the people go by in the park. She never tried to _ . She never said a word. Many people passed, _ never did one person stop. The next day I decided to go back to the _ , curious if the little girl would still be there. Right in the very _ as she was yesterday, she sat with the _ look in her eyes. _ I began walking towards her, I could see the back of the little girl's dress indicated a disability. I guessed maybe that was the _ the people just passed by and made no effort to help. But I wanted to help her, so I _ to let her know it was OK. I sat down beside her and _ with a simple "hello". The little girl was _ and replied a "hi" in a low voice. I asked the girl why she was so sad. The little girl looked at me and said, "Because I'm _ . " I immediately said, "That you are!"and smiled. The little girl acted _ sadder, and she said, "I know." "Little girl," I said, "you _ me of a sweet angel." She looked at me and smiled. Slowly she stood to her _ , and said, "Really?" "Yes, dear, you're _ a little guardian angel sent to watch over all those people walking by." She _ her head "yes". Then she spread her wings and said, "I am. I'm your guardian angel." I was _ by what I was seeing. She continued to say, "Because you think of someone other than yourself, my job here is done." Immediately, I also _ to my feet and said, "Wait, so why did no one stop to help an angel?" She looked at me and smiled, "You're the only one who could see me, and you _ an angel in your heart."
